name: FLIGHT DYNAMICS SCHOOL OF AERONAUTICS
about: The Flight Dynamics School of Aeronautics, established in 1987 as Link Flight Aviation School, is a premier institution in aviation education. Founded by Engr. Juanito M., the school has evolved to become a model of excellence in aviation, science, and technology. It offers comprehensive flight and ground training courses, including Private Pilot Licence, Night Rating, and Commercial Pilot Licence. The school is committed to upholding the highest standards in instruction and research to produce world-class technicians and pilots. With a long history of excellence, Flight Dynamics School of Aeronautics continues to be a leading choice for aspiring aviators.
services:
["Aircraft Maintenance Technology
Aviation Electronics Technology
Aircraft Maintenance Technology 
Aviation Maintenance Technology"]
